notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: T.T., A.S., and E.H. performed the syntheses; N.S. analyzed anti-influenza activities and cytotoxicity; T.T. and S.K. conceived of and designed the synthetic experiments; Y.S., O.H., and F.S. supervised and evaluated the synthetic and biological studies. Writing—original draft, T.T.; writing—review and editing, N.S., S.K., Y.S., H.O., and F.S.
